titles.title: Consumer Information Privacy Act

bill.summary: 5/5/1994--Introduced. Consumer Information Privacy Act - Requires businesses that compile consumer lists for sale to other businesses to notify such consumers of the sale of such lists. Declares that violations of this Act constitute an unfair or deceptive act or practice subject to enforcement under the Federal Trade Commission Act.
